hero.title: Get Your Business Online.
hero.subtitle: Fast. Affordable. Simple.
hero.description: We help South African small businesses thrive with websites, AI automation, and digital tools—without the big agency price tag.

painPoints.title: Sound Familiar?
painPoints.subtitle: These are the problems we solve every day for SA businesses like yours

noWebsite.title: No Website or Outdated Site
noWebsite.description: Your competitors are online. You're not. Or worse—your site looks like it's from 2010.
noWebsite.solution: Get a modern, mobile-friendly website in days.

missingAutomation.title: Missing Out on Automation
missingAutomation.description: Spending hours on repetitive tasks like answering customer questions or scheduling.
missingAutomation.solution: Automate with AI chatbots and smart workflows.

cantReach.title: Can't Reach Your Full Market
cantReach.description: South Africa is multilingual, but your site only speaks English.
cantReach.solution: Connect with customers in isiZulu, isiXhosa, Afrikaans, and more.

tooExpensive.title: Tech is Too Expensive
tooExpensive.description: You've been quoted R50,000+ for basic web development. That's not realistic for small business.
tooExpensive.solution: Fast, affordable solutions tailored to your budget.

services.title: What We Can Do For You
services.subtitle: Practical tech solutions that grow your business

cta.title: Ready to Upgrade Your Business?
cta.description: Get a free consultation and quote. No pressure, just honest advice on what will work for your business.

hero.title: Services That Grow Your Business
hero.subtitle: Fast, affordable, and actually useful. Pick what you need—or bundle for maximum impact.

website.title: Website Creation & Upgrades
website.description: A professional website isn't a luxury anymore—it's essential. We build fast, modern, mobile-friendly sites that actually bring in customers.

aiAutomation.title: AI Automation & Chatbots
aiAutomation.description: Stop spending hours on repetitive tasks. Our AI solutions handle customer queries, qualify leads, and automate workflows—so you can focus on growing your business.

customApps.title: Custom Apps & Tools
customApps.description: Need something specific? We build simple, effective apps tailored to your workflow—booking systems, inventory trackers, customer portals, and more.

googleBusiness.title: Google Business Profile Setup
googleBusiness.description: Show up when people in your area search for what you offer. We optimize your Google Business Profile so you appear on Maps and Search.

digitalMarketing.title: Digital Marketing Starter Packages
digitalMarketing.description: Simple, effective marketing that fits your budget. Social media setup, Google Ads basics, email campaigns—we get you started the right way.

consulting.title: Digital Transformation Consulting
consulting.tagline: Navigate the digital world with confidence
consulting.description: Not sure where to start? We'll assess your business, identify opportunities, and create a realistic roadmap for digital growth—no jargon, just clear advice.

whyUs.title: Why Work With Us?
whyUs.subtitle: We're not like those big agencies with 6-month timelines and corporate jargon

fastDelivery.title: Fast Delivery
fastDelivery.description: Most projects delivered in days, not months. You'll see results quickly.

clearComm.title: Clear Communication
clearComm.description: No tech jargon. We explain everything in plain language so you understand exactly what you're getting.

results.title: Results-Focused
results.description: We build things that actually help your business grow—more customers, less manual work, better visibility.

services.ctaDescription: Book a free consultation. We'll chat about your business goals and recommend the best solutions for your budget.
